page.title: 02WILDLIFE IN LYNSTED
page.content: There are many animals like hedgehogs, foxes, rabbits, mice, rats, voles & shrews. The hedgehogs are found round apple orchards. Sometimes they get into your garden. We have lots of foxes and some of them do damage. A few people have had geese & chicken eaten. The rabbits come in hundreds and sometimes are a nuisance. If the men up at the farm (Loyterton) are having a bonfire sometimes a rabbit gets burnt and runs out of the fire screaming. There is a nest of baby rabbits in a field near our house. Mice can end up in your house! Rats are everywhere & they always try to get your chickens! We have lost 4 chickens that way. I suppose we are lucky having so much wildlife about us. Keep still- there is always something to see.
